early_game.priority: Secure initial loot, then rotate early to ring
early_game.fence_usage: Minimal - save nodes for mid-game positioning
early_game.rotation_style: Proactive and early to claim defendable positions

mid_game.priority: Establish defensive positions in strong buildings or ring edge
mid_game.fence_usage: Heavy - create layered defenses on all approaches
mid_game.pylon_usage: Deploy when expecting engagement or grenade spam
mid_game.hold_vs_rotate: Hold strong positions unless forced by ring

end_game.priority: Dominate final rings through superior defensive setup
end_game.fence_usage: Maximum - all 12 nodes deployed in tight ring
end_game.pylon_usage: Always active for grenade defense and shield sustain
end_game.positioning: Claim high ground or central cover early, force enemies to push through fences

fight_initiation.preference: Defensive - let enemies come to you
fight_initiation.when_to_push: Only when team has numbers advantage or third-party opportunity
fight_initiation.escape_plan: Fall back to pre-placed fence layers

team_fight_role.positioning: Behind team, near pylon for shield regen
